title: Comedy is Over
author: VD
content_html:
Norm Macdonald was the last and best man standing. RIP Norm. If you don’t understand, watch this old interview.

And he didn’t lose his battle with cancer.

I’m pretty sure, I’m not a doctor, but I’m pretty sure if you die, the cancer dies at the same time. That’s not a loss. That’s a draw.
— Norm Macdonald
